name: fast-food-app
description: - A user can register and login. - A user should be able to order for food - The admin should be able to add, edit or delete the fast-food items - The admin should be able to see a list of fast-food items - The Admin user should be able to do the following:       See a list of orders       Accept and decline orders       Mark orders as completed - A user should be able to see a history of ordered food
